!Chuta Kaimu: The item you have brought here is surely a fragment of the weapon wielded by ancient Elrokian warriors to subjugate and control the vicious dinosaurs of the island. Blessed by Shilen herself, it was a powerful force for order in their hands. [Quest _125_InTheNameOfEvilPart1 reply_42|Show Chuta Kaimu the relic youy received from Mushika.]
